data.system_settings: iPhone 6s - iOS 11.4, iPad Air 2 - iOS 11.4.1 PB
data.actual_result: You will see a no result page for a short amount of time before the results appear.
data.expected_result: You should still see a loading spinner while the results are loading or the same screen as for the Desktop app (before searching we have to index the server/DM)
data.short_description: Not indexed servers and direct messages show the no result message for a short amount of time when searching
data.steps_to_repro: - Find any server or DM where you have never used the search before (they should have some messages) - Click on the search there - Use any filter or keyword and press enter to search - Observe it
